scripts.example-Run: spago build -x dev.dhall && (parcel serve --open -p 1337 --out-dir dev test/Test/Run/index.html & spago -x dev.dhall build --watch)
scripts.example-TransformPath: spago build -x dev.dhall && (parcel serve --open -p 1337 --out-dir dev test/Test/TransformPath/index.html & spago -x dev.dhall build --watch)
